full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 763 Filed 08/10/22 Page 134 of 197
LCHVMAX4
Healy - direct
entire three-year period?
A. I was receptionist for a good part of the time. So I did errands, answered phones, and then I was his assistant for a bit. So really running around New York City working for my bosses.
Q. Okay. And when you were working as a receptionist, where were you situated within the office?
A. So if you walk into the office, you come out of the elevator, I'm the first desk. I'm the first person that you would have seen.
Q. Okay. So if people came to visit the office in that time period, you were the first person that they would see?
A. Yes.
Q. And when you were working as Mr. Epstein's assistant, were you in a -- sitting in a different place in the office?
A. I was just in the front of the office.
Q. Okay.
A. So --
Q. And also when you're sitting in the front of the office, could visitors see you when they came to visit?
A. Yes.
Q. Can you remember the names of some of your coworkers when you worked in the office between '96 and '99?
A. Yes. There was Kimberly, there was Lauren, there was Eric, there was Darren, there was Jeff, and that's about all I can
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C.
(212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00016863

entire three-year period?

A. Yes. There was Kimberly, there was Lauren, there was Eric, there was Darren, there was Jeff, and that's about all I can
